ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class ScrollDisableableLinearLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager
      • android.support.v7.widget.LinearLayoutManager
        • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.ScrollDisableableLinearLayoutManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v7.widget.helper.ItemTouchHelper.ViewDropHandler, android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.ScrollVectorProvider, ScrollDisableable

    public class ScrollDisableableLinearLayoutManager
extends android.support.v7.widget.LinearLayoutManager
implements ScrollDisableable
    Normal LinearLayoutManager but can toggle scrolling on and off
    See Also:
    LinearLayoutManager, ScrollDisableable
